sentence.Network_en: Waitresses in our restaurant never treat guests discourteously or dishonestly.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我们饭店一定不能出现慢待客人的现象.

PerfectNetExp.abs: discourteous 失礼的discourteously 不礼貌地discourteousness 不礼貌

list.abs: Be courteous -- even when people are most discourteous to you ., 要有礼貌 ─ ─ 即使当别人对你最不礼貌的时候.

XVII . any discourteous behaviour a member of an official delegation can earn the disqualification of a competitor , the entire team , or delegation from the tournament .代表团的任何成员有无礼的行为，可导致选手、团队或代表团失格退出锦标赛。
a distant and at times discourteous young ., 冷漠的 , 有时有点粗鲁的年轻人.
definite reply 明确的答复discourteous reply 无礼的回答frank reply 率直的回答

auth_sentence.content: Lord Foulkes was warned that he would be expelled from the chamber if he behaved discourteously again.
